players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "Diana's death confirms a mafioso is among us. We need to analyze everyone's behavior carefully."
You: "Charlie seems nervous. I'll keep an eye on him."
Charlie: "I investigated Alice last night and she is the mafioso. We must vote her out today."
Bob: "I trust Charlie's investigation. Alice is the mafioso. Vote Alice."
Charlie: "Alice is the mafioso. Trust my investigation and vote her out now."
